title: Spacebar96
author: Spacebar96
content: The world is at a pivotal technological crossroads where it is undergoing a significant digital transition, developing quickly, and accepting new technology. Now that the "technocratic age" has begun, we are formally in it. The downsides of rapid progress, however, are numerous. Our vulnerability to cyberattacks increases as our reliance on technology grows.In this era of technology, how secure are we? The future, where the cyber attack surface is rising at a rapid rate, demands that action be taken immediately and rigidly. Cybersecurity has indeed become a hot topic in boardrooms.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I am quite secure online, I use a good VPN, I don’t visit shady websites. I don’t download movies, torrents & potentially rogue files. I basically just use the internet for browsing so I like to think I’m quite safe.Nobody can be 100% certain that they’re surfing securely but there are certain things that can be done to give yourself the best chance & I like to think that I practise safe internet use.

comments.author: Manorm
comments.body: In the era of digitalization it is impossible to feel safe, as they say we are all under the eyes of big brother

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Constant security is always important. I have this program with IObit's Advanced SystemCare Ultimate package to protect my computer. I love this program especially because it lets me know the performance of my computer. With an easy program interface, it has a scan mode that checks everything on the computer, privacy sweep, anti-virus protection, spyware, clean out junk files, firewall security reinforcement and disk optimization. The program itself does give a constant checkup of your computer knowing that while you are using the internet it gives you protection. The only con to this program is that it has constant advertisements for recommended software but that can be easily disabled.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Simply stick to the "golden rule of love"... avoid breaking the rules and creating loopholes and you will be fine. Make sure you are sound in mind and have light in you to avoid stumbling blocks or traps If you can strictly adhere to the above instructions, you will never need expensive/cheap man-made things to help secure you.
